items.desc: It seems the Group of Prof. Xu have made great breakthrough in InSb nanosheet Josephson junction, which is quiet close to the true PJJ, valuable keep watching.

items.desc: Maybe altermagnet can be used as a tool for MZM fusion control

items.desc: I like arrays, which looks like more fancy. The signatures of such JJ arrays is first studied to my knowledge.

items.title: Wang2025arXiv-Fermi surface dictates superconducting properties for a d-wave pairing state
items.filename: Wang2025arXiv-Fermi surface dictates superconducting properties for a d-wave pairing state.pdf
items.desc: d-wave Fermi surface properties are more rich in Altermagnet, tunable MZM could be realized in d-wave Altermagnet.

items.filename: Fu2025arXiv-Multiple Topological phases controlled via strain in Two-Dimensional Altermagnets.pdf
items.desc: a important reference which quiet close to what we have done, the model used in this paper is quiet complicated, the transition from QSH to QAH is controlled though strain, which has been mentioned before.

items.title: Schoeppl2025arXiv-Anisotropic transport in ballistic bilayer graphene cavities
items.filename: Schoeppl2025arXiv-Anisotropic transport in ballistic bilayer graphene cavities.pdf
items.desc: MHLiu's work, mainly disscuss the ballistic transport caused through the geometry change in bilayer graphene. This is quiet special, and may open the possibility to study the classic dynamics in twist system. Keep tracking, this topic still quiet interesting.

items.title: Lin2025arXiv-Chaos in BLG cavities
items.desc: The Fermi-surface related semiclassical analysis, but i feel there is no more quiet useful information in  this paper
